text: Guapira is a genus of Neotropical shrubs in four o'clock family.Jean Baptiste Christophe Fusée 1775. Histoire des Plantes de la Guiane Françoise 3: plate 119, line drawing of Guapira guianensis (mislabeled as Quapira Guianensis)The Plant List search for GuapiraAublet, Jean Baptiste Christophe Fusée 1775. Histoire des Plantes de la Guiane Françoise 1: 308 in Latin Its species are native to Mesoamerica, South America, the West Indies, and the extreme southern part of Florida.Flora of North America Vol. 4 Page 74 Guapira Aublet ;Species ==References== Category:Nyctaginaceae Category:Caryophyllales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Guapira
